Package org.drip.numerical.rdintegration

Rd to R1 Numerical Integration Schemes
Author:
Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    MonteCarloIntegrator
    MonteCarloIntegrator implements the following routines for Monte-Carlo Integration of Rd To R1 objective Function.
    MonteCarloRun
    MonteCarloRun holds the Results of a Rd To R1 Monte-Carlo Integration.
    MonteCarloRunStratifiedDiagnostics
    MonteCarloRunStratifiedDiagnostics holds the Results and Diagnostics of a Rd To R1 Stratified Monte-Carlo Integration.
    MonteCarloRunUniformDiagnostics
    MonteCarloRunUniformDiagnostics holds the Results and Diagnostics of a Rd To R1 Uniform Monte-Carlo Integration.
    QuadratureSetting
    QuadratureSetting provides the Setup for Rd To R1 Integration.
    QuadratureZone
    QuadratureZone holds the Quadrature Zone corresponding to an Integration of Rd To R1 Objective Function.
    QuadratureZoneOptimizationMetric
    QuadratureZoneOptimizationMetric holds the Optimization Metric of a Quadrature Zone corresponding to an Integration of Rd To R1 Objective Function.
    RecursiveStratifiedSamplingIntegrator
    RecursiveStratifiedSamplingIntegrator implements the following routines for Monte-Carlo Integration of Rd To R1 objective Function.
    UniformSamplingIntegrator
    UniformSamplingIntegrator implements Uniformly Sampled Monte-Carlo Integration of Rd To R1 Objective Function.
    VarianceSamplingSetting
    VarianceSamplingSetting implements the Settings for Variance Sampling used in Monte-Carlo Integration of Rd To R1 Objective Function.
    VarianceSamplingZoneExtractor
    VarianceSamplingZoneExtractor implements the Scheme for generating Variance Zones used in Recursive Sampling Monte-Carlo Integration of Rd To R1 Integrand.
